entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
